scenarios.label: Baseline / Recommended
scenarios.description: Small production web app for ~50k MAU using App Service, Azure SQL Database, Azure Cache for Redis, and Blob Storage with 99.9% availability in West Europe.

resources.notes: Single production VNet with subnets for App Service integration, private endpoints for SQL, Redis, and Storage. No direct VNet cost but needed for topology.
Premium v3 P1v3 App Service Plan (2 vCPUs, 8 GB RAM). Configure 2 always-on instances for 99.9% availability and autoscale rules. 300 GB egress/month assumed for web traffic.
resources.product_name: Azure App Service Premium v3 Plan - Linux

sku_candidates.product_name: Azure App Service Premium v3 Plan - Linux
Azure App Service Premium v4 Plan - Linux
Azure App Service Premium v2 Plan - Linux
Azure App Service Premium v4 Plan
Azure App Service Premium v3 Plan

resources.notes: Single Web App running on the Premium v3 plan. 2 instances configured at the plan level. Operations_per_month is a rough proxy for HTTP requests.
resources.product_name: Web App (logical, billed via App Service Plan)

resources.notes: Azure SQL Database General Purpose Gen5, 2 vCores, 128 GB storage. Zone redundant disabled by default; 99.99% DB SLA, app-level SLA ~99.9%. Egress for occasional data export/backup reads.
resources.product_name: SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5

sku_candidates.product_name: SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5
SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5
SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5
SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5
SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5

resources.notes: Standard C1 (1 GB) cache for session and hot data caching. Replicated for HA. Egress minimal as traffic is within VNet; 20 GB for management/diagnostics.
General-purpose v2 storage account with Blob (Hot and Cool tiers). 200 GB hot for active content, 100 GB cool for older assets. GRS for durability. 200 GB egress/month for user downloads.
resources.meter_name: Delete Operations, Cool Data Scanned for Query Acceleration

sku_candidates.meter_name: Cool Data Scanned for Query Acceleration
sku_candidates.product_name: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 Hierarchical Namespace

resources.notes: Application Gateway v2 with WAF for HTTPS termination, basic WAF protection, and routing to App Service. 300 GB egress aligned with web traffic estimate.
Standard public IP for Application Gateway endpoint.
NAT Gateway for outbound internet access from integrated services (App Service, etc.). 150 GB outbound traffic assumed for API calls, updates, and telemetry.
resources.meter_name: Standard Inter-Availability Zone Data Transfer Out

sku_candidates.meter_name: Standard Inter-Availability Zone Data Transfer Out

resources.notes: Aggregate outbound data transfer to internet (App Service + Blob + SQL exports). 500 GB/month as a conservative estimate for 50k MAU.
resources.meter_name: Standard Inter-Availability Zone Data Transfer Out

sku_candidates.meter_name: Standard Inter-Availability Zone Data Transfer Out

resources.notes: Standard Key Vault for secrets, keys, and certificates used by App Service and other components. Includes typical operation volume for secret reads and renewals.
Log Analytics workspace for App Service, SQL diagnostics, Redis, Application Gateway, and platform logs. 200 GB/month ingestion, 100 GB archived assumed.
Recovery Services vault for backups of App Service content (via Storage), SQL long-term backups, and configuration. 250 GB backup storage assumed.
resources.meter_name: ADLS Gen2 Vaulted LRS Write Operations

sku_candidates.meter_name: ADLS Gen2 Vaulted LRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted ZRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted RA-GRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted GRS Write Operations

resources.notes: Placeholder for DR coverage (e.g., protecting a small supporting VM or future expansion). For pure PaaS, ASR is minimal; main DR is via built-in geo-redundancy and backups.
Azure Bastion Basic for secure browser-based access to any future VMs or management hosts. Estimated 160 hours/month of active use.

scenarios.label: Cost Optimized
scenarios.description: Lower-cost variant using smaller App Service plan, single-zone resources, and reduced monitoring/backup volumes while maintaining 99.9% availability.

resources.notes: Single VNet for production with minimal subnets and private endpoints.
Standard S1 App Service Plan (1 vCPU, 1.75 GB RAM) with 2 instances for HA. Reserved instance pricing assumed for cost optimization.

sku_candidates.product_name: Azure App Service Standard Plan - Linux

resources.notes: Single Web App on S1 plan. 2 instances configured to meet 99.9% availability.
resources.product_name: Web App (logical, billed via App Service Plan)

resources.notes: Azure SQL Database General Purpose Gen5, 1 vCore, 64 GB storage. Suitable for small workload with 50k MAU if queries are optimized. Reserved capacity for cost savings.
resources.product_name: SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5

SQL Database Single/Elastic Pool General Purpose - Compute Gen5

resources.notes: Basic C0 (256 MB) Redis cache to reduce SQL load. No replica, so slightly lower resilience but cheaper. Consider upgrading to Standard if cache is critical.
GPv2 storage with LRS instead of GRS to reduce cost. 100 GB hot, 50 GB cool. Suitable if cross-region durability is not mandatory.

Recovery Services vault with leaner backup retention, 150 GB backup storage.

scenarios.label: High Performance / Scalable
scenarios.description: Higher performance and resilience with larger App Service plan, more powerful SQL tier, Standard Redis, and higher throughput assumptions for future growth beyond 50k MAU.

resources.notes: Production VNet with subnets sized for future scaling and additional services.
Premium v3 P2v3 (4 vCPUs, 16 GB RAM) with 3 instances for higher concurrency and headroom. Reserved pricing for long-term production.
